## **Software**
<p>&nbsp;</p>

#### [**cquad**](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/cquad/index.html): Conditional Maximum Likelihood for Quadratic Exponential Models for Binary Panel Data. [R](https://www.r-project.org/) package, 2020.
<p>&nbsp;</p>

#### [**cquadr**](https://ideas.repec.org/c/boc/bocode/s458852.html): Stata module to estimate Quadratic Exponential models running the cquad R package. [Stata](https://www.stata.com/) module, 2020. (also available [here](https://github.com/fravale/cquadr))
<p>&nbsp;</p>

#### [**spm**](http://ricardo.ecn.wfu.edu/gretl/cgi-bin/current_fnfiles/spm.zip): Spatial Regression Models. [gretl](http://gretl.sourceforge.net/) function package, 2019.
